name: Glorious Style
description:
This is a DreamArtist Textual Inversion Style Embedding trained on a single image of glorious, imposing castles, towers, and ivy covered ruins. You can get stunning backdrops in your images by calling Style-Glorious in the positive prompt, and if you want to temper the effect, also call Style-Glorious-neg in the negative prompt.

If you'd like the effect to come through stronger (some models need it), try bumping up the emphasis on Style-Glorious - see the images below.

Please consider joining my Patreon! Advanced SD tutorials, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally

Props to Elldreth for the many hours spent figuring this all out with me! Go check his models.

meta.prompt: award winning landscape photo of a medieval street background, sinister, evil, (backlighting:1.3), digital painting, concept art, smooth, sharp focus, rule of thirds, dark fantasy,intricate details, art by aleksi briclot (shallow depth of field:1.1) Style by Style-Glorious
meta.negativePrompt: Deformed, blurry, bad anatomy, disfigured, extra limb, ugly, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, blurry, floating limbs, ((mutated hands and fingers)), ((anthro)), ((animal)), crown, flowers, candle, fire, flame, hat, horse, riding, umbrella, snow, zipper, zip, sombrero, armor, shoulder pads, shoulter armor
